thread.title: Arsenal line up bid for £13m Sporting goalkeeper Rui Patricio to replace ageing Petr Cech
thread.title_full: Arsenal line up bid for £13m Sporting goalkeeper Rui Patricio to replace ageing Petr Cech

author: tsheen
title: Arsenal line up bid for £13m Sporting goalkeeper Rui Patricio to replace ageing Petr Cech
text:
Arsenal line up bid for £13m Sporting goalkeeper Rui Patricio to replace ageing Petr Cech 
Cech, 34, has struggled at times for the Gunners this season Gossip Comments ARSENAL are lining up a replacement for goalkeeper Petr Cech, according to reports in France. 
The former Chelsea star , 34, has struggled at times this season and with No 2 David Ospina not able to seize control of the position, the club have apparently found their new man. Reuters Arsenal are interested in Sporting goalkeeper Rui Patricio – who was named in the team of the tournament at Euro 2016 Reuters Petr Cech has struggled at times this season and is out injured for the next month 
French radio station RMC claims Arsenal want Sporting Lisbon and Portugal stopper Rui Patricio. 
With Arsene Wenger’s future unclear, there is no hint of whether this is a Wenger target or someone else. 
The radio station claims that the Gunners will make a £13million bid for the 29-year-old this summer. 
Patricio has previously been linked with Watford . 
There is also the looming return of Wojciech Szczesny, who returns on loan from Roma this summer. 
The Pole has spent two brilliant years in Serie A, becoming one of the best keepers in Italy, and is still only 26. PA:Press Association Arsene Wenger is yet to make up his mind on his Arsenal future MOST READ IN FOOTBALL diamonds are forever Chelsea's new Nike kit leaked online... and it looks just like shirt from 30 years ago when they were relegated in shame REAL PAIGE-TURNEr WWE leaked sex tape saga hots up as MORE raunchy videos and pics of ex-champ Paige are shared online X-RATED SHOCKER Paige sex tape bombshell as fans express outrage at 'sex act over WWE championship belt' Big neym signing Man Utd in 'talks with Neymar's agent over £173m move and £416k-a-week deal' LIONHEART Brave Bradley Lowery gets the biggest cheer at Wembley as he leads out the England team with goal hero and best mate Jermain Defoe leg-break horror Seamus Coleman set for surgery on potential career-threatening injury after his leg is snapped in half by Neil Taylor's wild tackle 
The 6ft 3in Patricio was a key performer for Portugal in their victorious Euro 2016 campaign last summer. 
The keeper, who has 57 caps, was named in the team of the tournament, saved a penalty in the quarter-final win over Poland and kept clean sheets against Croatia, Wales and France in the latter stages. 
He has played almost 400 games for Sporting, winning the Portuguese league in 2015. Getty Images 4 Wojciech Szczesny has been in tremendous form during his two-year loan at Roma and returns to Arsenal this summer 
Cech has drawn criticism from Arsenal fans this season, with a number of them wanting Ospina to replace the veteran in goal on a full-time basis. 
He was involved in a high profile blunder against rivals Chelsea. 
With Cech expected to be out for at least a month after picking up a calf injury against West Brom, those fans will get their wish. Arsenal boss Arsene Wenger is still undecided about his future
